dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Casey Graff
dcterms:description: The KDDCup99 10 percent dataset has been a benchmark dataset for anomaly detection tasks. We choose the 'Normal' class label as normal data and attack classes are treated as anomalies.
dcterms:title: KDDCup99

dcterms:creator: Mahbod Tavallaee
Ebrahim Bagheri
Wei Lu
Ali A Ghorbani
dcterms:description: The combined train and test partitions of the original dataset is used, with a 'Normal' class chosen as normal data and the rest as anomalies.
dcterms:title: KDDCup99-N

dcterms:creator: N. Moustafa
J. Slay
dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset for network intrusion detection systems, where the 'Normal' class is selected as normal data, and rarer attack classes 'Backdoor', 'Analysis', 'Shellcode', and 'Worms' as anomalies.
dcterms:title: UNSW-NB15

dcterms:creator: Mahbod Tavallaee
Ebrahim Bagheri
Wei Lu
Ali A Ghorbani
dcterms:description: The combined train and test partitions of the original dataset is used, with a 'Normal' class chosen as normal data and the rest as anomalies.
dcterms:title: NSL-KDD

dcterms:creator: IAigo Perona
Ibai Gurrutxaga
Olatz Arbelaitz
José I. Martín
Javier Muguerza
Jesús Ma Párez
dcterms:description: The dataset is used for service-independent payload analysis to improve intrusion detection in network traffic.
dcterms:title: Gure-KDD

dcterms:creator: Panjiva
dcterms:description: The dataset contains over a million rows spanning multiple years and over 70 attributes related to international trade, specifically focusing on timber trade.
dcterms:title: Panjiva Trade Data
